task.title: How to Configure an IBM DB2 Connection

prereq.p: The support to create an IBM DB2 connection is available in the Enterprise edition only.

context.p: To configure a connection to an IBM DB2 server, follow these steps:

step.cmd: In the Connections panel, click the New button.

stepresult.p: The dialog box for configuring a database connection is displayed.

step.cmd: Enter a unique name for the connection.
Select an IBM DB2 data source in the Data Source drop-down menu.

substep.cmd: Enter the URL to the installed IBM DB2 engine.
Enter the user name to access the IBM DB2 engine.
Enter the password to access the IBM DB2 engine.

step.cmd: Click the OK button to finish the configuration of the database connection.
